title: Had/Should/Were 도치 복합
description: Had, Should, Were를 사용한 도치 구문을 복합적으로 활용하여 고급 표현을 연습합니다.
examples: Had I known the truth, I would have acted differently.
Should the weather improve, we'll go hiking.
Were the situation different, I might agree with you.
learning_points: Had/Should/Were 도치 구문의 복합적 활용을 통한 정교한 표현

sentences.en: Had I known the truth, I would have acted differently.
Should the weather improve, we'll go hiking.
Were the situation different, I might agree with you.

sentences.kr: 미리 준비했더라면 더 나은 성과를 거둘 수 있었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we prepared in advance, we could have achieved better results.
Should any problems arise, we will respond immediately.

sentences.kr: 제가 CEO라면 다른 결정을 내렸을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were I the CEO, I would have made different decisions.

sentences.kr: 그 계획을 미리 알았더라면 참여할 수 있었을 텐데요.
sentences.en: Had I known about the plan earlier, I could have participated.

sentences.kr: 추가 자금이 필요하다면 다른 방안을 모색해야 합니다.
sentences.en: Should additional funding be needed, we must explore other options.
